name: O U T S I D E
name_original: O U T S I D E
description:
Use 1 - 2 - 3 of keyboard to change the size of screen.

A Casual gameboy game with phase system but this time the player receives a gift from another galaxy, This gift allows you to do incredible things!!

Simple movements, deviate from the great enemy with WASD. On Menu, use SPACE for select the savefile and start the game.

Hit and destroy the buttons for more POINTS!
